settings.title: Instant Power
settings.description: The 1300W peak mid-drive motor delivers natural, balanced thrust with millisecond response. Powers through steep hills and extreme terrain effortlessly.

settings.title: Conquer Rough Terrain
settings.description: Full suspension system with dual front and rear shocks maintains stable control. Absorbs impacts from rocks, potholes, and steep slopes for smooth adventures.

settings.title: Ride Free, Arrive Easy
settings.description: 48V 19.6Ah (940Wh) battery provides up to 80 miles per charge. Say goodbye to range anxiety and frequent charging. Start anytime.

settings.title: Instant Braking
settings.description: Quad-piston hydraulic brakes double the stopping power. Delivers instant response with a light touch on levers, ensuring precise control and safety on complex terrain.

settings.title: Control Your Ride
settings.description: Shimano's 10-speed drivetrain enables precise gear control. Quiet, swift shifting ensures smooth pedaling for efficient commutes or off-road rides.

settings.title: Sunlight fuels your journey.
settings.description:
World‚Äôs first 1.6kg inverter with integrated 230W solar charging.

A mobile power station, powered by sunlight.

Powers 95% of your travel appliances.

Freedom rises with the sun.

Bring your lifestyle and rhythm with you.

Ride to the end of the horizon.

settings.title: DNM 50mm Center Shock Absorber
settings.description: The DNM 50mm mid shock absorbs rear-wheel impacts with precision. Delivers a smoother ride over rocky or uneven trails.

settings.title: 135mm Dual-Crown Hydraulic Front Fork
settings.description: Long-travel provides an extended buffer. Customizable rebound absorbs intense trail impacts. The dual-crown structure ensures rigid and stable control.

settings.title: 3.1" HD Stem Display
settings.description: Wide viewing angles display clear ride data, day or night, for safe starts anytime.

settings.title: Torque Sensor
settings.description: Instantly adjusts motor output to match your pedaling force and cadence. Delivers smooth, natural, and efficient rides on trails or streets.

settings.title: Hidden Hand-Control Dropper Seatpost
settings.description: Adjust saddle height instantly with one button to fit your riding style.

settings.title: Adjustable Stem
settings.description: Customize height for different rider sizes. Maintains stable control across changing terrain.

settings.title: Thickened Comfort Saddle
settings.description: Made with high-resilience padding and a thicker design, this saddle offers extra support and absorbs bumps from rough terrain.

settings.title: Unique Ergonomic Grips
settings.description: The Bubble Relief Zones at key pressure points protect your joints, keeping you relaxed and comfortable throughout your ride.

settings.subtext: Equipped with a 1300W peak mid-drive motor, it delivers powerful performance for a smoother ride. The torque sensor automatically adjusts motor assistance based on pedaling force, ensuring efficient and fluid acceleration for a stronger riding experience.

Equipped with a high-capacity 48V 19.6Ah removable battery, offers easy charging without moving the entire bike. Take it with you for added convenience and theft prevention, ensuring a worry-free ride.UL certified for superior performance and reliability.

Our e-bikes feature Texas Instruments (TI) BMS chips , ensuring safer, longer-lasting, and more efficient batteries with intelligent protection and precision power management. Ride with confidence, powered by industry-leading technology.

Built-in high-definition display with a sleek and modern design, showing real-time key riding data, making every trip smarter and more convenient. The password lock feature effectively prevents unauthorized access, enhancing security. Additionally, the adjustable stem design ensures a comfortable riding posture.

38RC Dual Air Valve Shock Absorber, 50mm travel, with adjustable resistance: Easily adjust the resistance using the blue knob to fine-tune your ride, ensuring smoother handling and enhanced comfort on any terrain.

135mm travel dual crown suspension fork, offering excellent shock absorption, easily handling rough terrains and enhancing stability and comfort. With a sleek, aggressive look, it perfectly combines performance and visual impact.

Upgraded Shimano 10-speed derailleur offers a wider gear range, making it adaptable to various terrains such as mountains, sand, and urban roads. With more gearing options, you can always find the perfect cadence for a smoother and more efficient riding experience.

Equipped with the Tektro hydraulic braking system, it ensures superior braking performance and rapid response in emergencies, significantly enhancing riding safety. Whether on steep slopes, wet roads, or rough terrains, you can rely on stable and secure braking for a safer ride.

Simply twist the throttle to accelerate effortlessly‚Äîno pedaling required for an easy and convenient ride. Enjoy smooth cruising anytime without exertion. (An optional rear rack with turn signals enhances safety and functionality.)
Dual high-intensity bulb system provides exceptional visibility. This headlight offers higher brightness with a focused beam, ensuring outstanding clarity and safety even in the darkest conditions.
Equipped with a taillight, it effectively enhances nighttime riding safety, ensuring visibility in low-light conditions, allowing you to ride worry-free and ensuring a secure journey.

settings.content: "The Mokwheel Obsidian is a great fat tire e-bike and will surely make its owners happy on its own. But it shines with the energy harvesting and sharing accessories that turn the e-bike into something special."

"The best part about Mokwheel is their soft seating with extra cushioning which helps the bum stay on the seat during a long ride which is the case most of the time with its range of 80Miles. The bike does weigh a bit so it is more suitable for people with a larger build, anywhere from 5‚Äô6‚Ä≥ ~ 6‚Äô8‚Ä≥."

"The size and up-right position take the Mokwheel Obsidian Electric Bicycle out of the mountain bike sphere. From uneven pavement to muddy gravel roads, However the bike is confidence inspiring anywhere it goes."

The Mokwheel Obsidian ST offers a pretty solid package for an all-terrain e-bike. The 1000W motor packs a serious punch, giving you plenty of power and torque for climbing hills and blasting down the road. The full suspension and stiff step-through frame make for a comfortable ride with easy access, especially on rougher trails.

As a power station ebike, the Obsidian ST offers the ability to charge your electronic devices on the go and harness solar energy for extended range. With its powerful motor, long range, adjustable suspension, and versatile design, the Obsidian ST is ideal for commuting. off-road adventures, and outdoor activities.
"Mokwheel strives to reach the hearts of consumers by offering exceptional products and services with honesty and transparency."

Mokwheel is known for their high-quality design, rugged frames, and powerful electric motors, making their bikes perfect for those who crave both adventure and performance. If you‚Äôre on the lookout for anelectric mountain bike deal, Mokwheel‚Äôs collection will exceed your expectations.

The Mokwheel ebikes has emerged onto the scene, not just as another entrant in the growing e-bike market, but as a trailblazer promising to whisk you away on a journey where the pavement ends and the adventure begins.

"The Mokwheel ebikes is a great fat tire e-bike and will surely make its owners happy on its own. But it shines with the energy harvesting and sharing accessories that turn the e-bike into something special."

"The best part about Mokwheel is their soft seating with extra cushioning which helps the bum stay on the seat during a long ride which is the case most of the time with its range of 80Miles. The bike does weigh a bit so it is more suitable for people with a larger build, anywhere from 5‚Äô7‚Ä≥ ~ 6‚Äô9‚Ä≥."

"The size and up-right position take the ebike Electric Bicycle out of the mountain bike sphere. From uneven pavement to muddy gravel roads, However the bike is confidence inspiring anywhere it goes."
"Mokwheel strives to reach the hearts of consumers by offering exceptional products and services with honesty and transparency."

Mokwheel is known for their high-quality design, rugged frames, and powerful electric motors, making their bikes perfect for those who crave both adventure and performance. If you‚Äôre on the lookout for anelectric mountain bike deal, Mokwheel‚Äôs collection will exceed your expectations.

settings.title: Experience the Ride
settings.content: Be part of Mokwheel, and help us deliver the spirit of free riding to every street, every city.

settings.title: Partner with Mokwheel
settings.content: No amount of data beats a real ride. At our stores, you can feel the build, sense the power. Two legs. One bike. One short ride.

settings.title: Excellence in Care
settings.content: Our dealers are trained experts who can help by understanding your needs and guide you towards the perfect ebike along with answering any questions you may have.

settings.title: How long until I receive my bike?
settings.rich_content: The order will be processed in 48 business hours. Once the order has shipped, a shipping confirmation email will be sent to your email. We use FedEx or UPS for shipping. Please allow 2~7 business days for the shipment to arrive at your designated location. Any delivery dates provided by Mokwheel are estimates.

settings.title: Do I need a license for riding Ebike?
settings.rich_content: No, you don‚Äôt need a license to ride an e-bike. Please read the Safety Instructions carefully, however, for your safety.

settings.title: How do I charge my battery?
settings.rich_content: You can check the Battery and Charger of our E-BIKE USER MANUAL. The methods are listed in the manual in more detail

settings.title: How to find the Ebike that fits me?
settings.rich_content: You can check our Compare Models for the difference in our Ebike.

settings.title: How to clean my Ebike?
settings.rich_content: We send a wrench, bicycle pump, and front full fender, with our Ebike.

settings.title: What accessories come with Ebike?
settings.rich_content: We send a wrench, bicycle pump and front full fender, with our Ebike.
